history.content:
Want to have your voice heard by EECS faculty, staff, and the Chairs? The EECS Department welcomes you to fill out the EECS Undergraduate Survey here:
https://berkeley.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_9KSsq7gGNA8Wb53
The EECS Department has created the 2019-2020 EECS Undergraduate Survey so you can provide input and feedback. This is a great opportunity for you to make a real impact in your classes, student life, and campus culture as well as share your personal experiences in EE/CS with the department anonymously. A team of students from community-based organizations will be reviewing all of your responses and providing feedback as well as pushing for changes to be made at the Faculty Retreat. Additionally, if you or a representative from your student organization would like to get involved, please fill out this form (https://forms.gle/xNG4eXmTjkvF1YsS7). 
In addition, once you complete the survey, you can choose to enter a prize drawing to win one of fifteen (15) $10 Amazon gift cards! Just make sure to fill out the form at the end of the survey.
Your response is completely anonymous. We encourage you to respond openly and honestly!
history.subject: Last Chance to Respond to the Survey plus a Call to Reps of Student Orgs
